channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: There are more than 30 lime bikes scattered all over the pavement outside 15 Portman Square and this is a constant issue., 8th July
item.description:
There are more than 30 lime bikes scattered all over the pavement outside 15 Portman Square and this is a constant issue.

item.title: Quite a few pretty much in 1 spot in centre if road, 8th July
item.description:
Quite a few in 1 spot almost impossible to avoid its as you turn into whitefields Road from brook8lane unfortunately haven't been able to get pics atm but need doing asap

item.title: Blocked pavement, 8th July
item.description:
I reported this 2 days ago. Today you sent me a email saying it has been sorted. Lies, it is still here and no one came to take it away. Your workers should be sacked for this false clean up

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Theydon Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Littedr Picking, 8th July
item.description:
Green area for Palace Square is not being litter picked, please can this be cleared and done on a regular basis.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 34-60, Palace Square, Crystal Palace, London

item.title: Communal area have still not been cleaned, 8th July
item.description:
Since reporting dirty communal areas Ilthey have not been cleaned yet. The cleaning should happen twice per week but nothing has been cleaned since Mid May.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 116, Sedgmoor Place, Camberwell, London

item.title: 101 -103 Winston Road, 8th July
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Winston Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very unsafe paving stone, 8th July
item.description:
There is a very unsafe paving stone by a small tree in the pavement outside 80 The Limes Avenue. It has an unsafe edge and is at an angle. The council is due to replace the pavement in this area but this seems to have been postponed until ‘sometime this year’ and someone could be badly injured in the meantime. Schoolchildren walk along here. The stone needs to be sorted.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 78, The Limes Avenue, New Southgate, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive litter around tree pit, 8th July
item.description:
There is a lot of litter on Finsbury Park Road generally but there is an excessive amount of litter around the tree pit outside no 60/58 Finsbury Park Road which has been there since Friday 4th July.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Finsbury Park Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep sink hole between 44-46 Belmont Road, 8th July
item.description:
On the left hand side Belmont Road between 44 - 46 a large sink hole has appeared and is very dangerous. The depth is almost a foot deep and about a foot wide.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 67, Belmont Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
